      • calculateRequiredMarginForFutures

        spec - core symbol specification
        Returns:
        required margin

      • calculateRequiredMarginForOrder

        public long calculateRequiredMarginForOrder(CoreSymbolSpecification spec,
                                            OrderAction action,
                                            long size)
        Calculate required margin based on specification and current position/orders considering extra size added to current position (or outstanding orders)
        Parameters:
        spec - symbols specification
        action - order action
        size - order size
        Returns:
        -1 if order will reduce current exposure (no additional margin required), otherwise full margin for symbol position if order placed/executed

      • updatePositionForMarginTrade

        public long updatePositionForMarginTrade(OrderAction action,
                                         long size,
                                         long price)
        Update position for one user 1. Un-hold pending size 2. Reduce opposite position accordingly (if exists) 3. Increase forward position accordingly (if size left in the trading event)
        Parameters:
        action - order action
        size - order size
        price - order price
        Returns:
        opened size
